description:
When a closed group wants to reapply for a loan in Mifos X, another group has to be created. For better group management, a new feature to reactivate a group once it has been closed has to be developed. This will reduce the number of groups.

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/FINERACT-390
name: Apache Fineract - Add Reactivation Feature For Closed Groups
